name: David Ferguson
text: This place is a joke. They can’t even understand orders

name: Ray Morin
text: I Love Pizza and a wide variety of Italian food but nothing I have ever bought here was very good so I never go there anymore.

name: Paul Morgan
text: Used to be a big fan of Sbarro's but every visit makes me rethink that. This location pretty much sealed the fate. Food quality has decreased, tomato and cucumber salad was OLD and GREASY, pizzas are not enjoyable and it was almost an …More

name: Dorota Neff
text: Went there yesterday and got spinach Stromboli. Half way through the sandwich I found an inch long piece of, what looked like, plastic fishing line. Sorry, but avoid!!!

name: Sonja Muenchen
text:
(Translated by Google) Fast food pizza and pasta, that's the main offer at sbarro.
The fine, Italian cuisine is not, but I still enjoy it. …More
